solution_line_template: After the delivery there are {delivered_green_apples} + {original_green_apples} = <<{delivered_green_apples}+{original_green_apples}={total_green_apples}>>{total_green_apples} green apples
There are now {total_green_apples} - {red_apples} = <<{total_green_apples}-{red_apples}={difference_green_red}>>{difference_green_red} more green apples than red apples now.
